revision.text: {{WikiProject banner shell|1= {{WikiProject Engineering|class=c|importance=Low}} {{WikiProject Robotics|class=c|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Companies|class=c|importance=low}} }} == New Logo == 3D systems has a new logo. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/60.242.189.200|60.242.189.200]] ([[User talk:60.242.189.200|talk]]) 10:23, 21 September 2012 (UTC) ==I know weasel words are a bane of Wikipedia, but "Prior to Hull's introduction of SLA rapid prototyping, concept models required extensive time and money to produce" seems too strong to me. Certainly, many concept models were produced quickly and cheaply, depending on the product area.[[Special:Contributions/202.179.19.24|202.179.19.24]] ([[User talk:202.179.19.24|talk]]) == Fair use candidate from Commons: [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]] == The file [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]], used on this page, has been [[:commons:File:3D Systems Logo.gif|deleted from Wikimedia Commons]] and re-uploaded at [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]]. It should be reviewed to determine if it is compliant with this project's non-free content policy, or else should be deleted and removed from this page. If no action is taken, it will be deleted after 7 days. [[User:Commons fair use upload bot|Commons fair use upload bot]] ([[User talk:Commons fair use upload bot|talk]]) 05:30, 27 April 2013 (UTC) == Fair use candidate from Commons: [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]] == The file [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]], used on this page, has been [[:commons:File:3D Systems Logo.gif|deleted from Wikimedia Commons]] and re-uploaded at [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]]. It should be reviewed to determine if it is compliant with this project's non-free content policy, or else should be deleted and removed from this page. If no action is taken, it will be deleted after 7 days. [[User:Commons fair use upload bot|Commons fair use upload bot]] ([[User talk:Commons fair use upload bot|talk]]) 05:35, 27 April 2013 (UTC) == Fair use candidate from Commons: [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]] == The file [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]], used on this page, has been [[:commons:File:3D Systems Logo.gif|deleted from Wikimedia Commons]] and re-uploaded at [[:File:3D Systems Logo.gif]]. It should be reviewed to determine if it is compliant with this project's non-free content policy, or else should be deleted and removed from this page. If no action is taken, it will be deleted after 7 days. [[User:Commons fair use upload bot|Commons fair use upload bot]] ([[User talk:Commons fair use upload bot|talk]]) 09:55, 27 April 2013 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[3D Systems]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=699884013 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20140802025133/http://www.globes.co.il:80/en/article-3d-systems-acquires-simbionix-for-120m-1000959570 to http://www.globes.co.il/en/article-3d-systems-acquires-simbionix-for-120m-1000959570 *Attempted to fix sourcing for http://3dsystems.com/company/patents/index.asp When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=failed}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 00:52, 15 January 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[3D Systems]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=711175786 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20140802025133/http://www.globes.co.il:80/en/article-3d-systems-acquires-simbionix-for-120m-1000959570 to http://www.globes.co.il/en/article-3d-systems-acquires-simbionix-for-120m-1000959570 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=true}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 09:06, 21 March 2016 (UTC) == Grey Wolf Report == What is a 'Grey Wolf Report'?
